San_Buenaventura_(Ventura).Elizabeth Bard Memorial Hospital: Elizabeth Bard Memorial Hospital, also known as Bard Hospital, built in 1902, is an office building in Downtown Ventura, California. Featuring covered terraces and a covered porch with a three-story bell tower at the southeast corner, the facade is considered a quintessential Mission Revival Style building. This building was among the numerous that used this easily recognizable architectural style during the Mission Revival movement that was at its greatest popularity between 1890 and 1915.
